import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import TimelineRight from "./timeline_right"; import Url from "../../util/Config"; import Like from "./components/Like"; import Navbar from "../components/navbar/Navbar" import Footer from "../components/footer/Footer" function Timeline(props) { //taking userid from localstorage const id = localStorage.getItem("id"); //settting up hooks const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [user, setUser] = useState({}); const [click, setClick] = useState(0); //fetching all post from database useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${Url.baseurl}/upload/getpost`).then((response) => { setData(response.data); }); //featching user details axios.post(`${Url.baseurl}/auth/users`, { _id: id }).then((response) => { setUser(response.data); }); }, [click,3]); //trigering effect on every new post const ReloadPageOnEveryPost = (e) => { setClick(click + 1); }; const updateClick = async (postId, e) => { //updating likes e.preventDefault(); await Like.Makelikes(postId, id); setClick(click + 1); }; return (
  • Friends

{data .map((item) => { return (
{item.description}
{item.category}
{item.username}
{item.date} {item.time}
  • Share

  • updateClick(item._id, e)}> {item.likes.length} Likes
  • {item.comments.length} Comments
); }) .reverse()}
); } export default Timeline;
